meta.content: ObjectLab Kit offers free and open source Date calculators, released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Date calculator, IMM Dates, Period Calculator, Financial Calendar, Business Calendar, java, open source

section.name: Maven Dependency
section.p:
We're in Maven Central Repo, so if you're using Maven, you can just insert this dependency in your project's pom.xml:
<dependency> <groupId>net.objectlab.kit.datecalc</groupId> <artifactId>datecalc-joda</artifactId> <version>1.2.0</version> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>net.objectlab.kit.datecalc</groupId> <artifactId>datecalc-jdk</artifactId> <version>1.2.0</version> </dependency>

section.name: Download the jars
section.p: Alternatively, you can download the zip file which contains all of the jars.
